commitResults.messageTitle: Level-1
Level-2
Level-3
A-Classes
Level-4, A-Inheritance
A-TextUiTesting
A-Exceptions
Update exception handling for MARK and UNMARK states
commitResults.messageBody: Reorganised and fixed the try-catch block for MARK and UNMARK states.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add DELETE state
commitResults.messageBody: Implemented a DELETE state for delete commands to remove tasks from the list. The NumberFormatException and IndexOutOfBoundsException are handled also accordingly.

commitResults.messageTitle: Remove emoticon in error messages
commitResults.messageBody: Error messages no longer have an emoticon to remedy the unmappable character (0xB9) for encoding US-ASCII error.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add DataHandler class to create, read and write data to save file.
Teach Sunday how to understand dates and times.
commitResults.messageBody:
Input format of dates and times follows "dd/mm/yyyy hhmm". Write format of dates and times follows "E, MMM dd yyyy, h:mm aa".

The text-ui-test inputs and expected outputs have also been updated accordingly.

commitResults.messageTitle: Fix save bug for deadline and event tasks.
commitResults.messageBody:
Deadline and Event tasks are now save with their date attributes according to the read format of ""dd/mm/yyyy hhmm". To achieve this, the Task class has been made abstract with the save() abstract method for child classes to override with their own implementations of how it should be saved.

A minor change was also made to the DataHandler class to remove the wildcard import. Redundant imports were also removed from the State class and Sunday class.

commitResults.messageTitle: Refactor code to extract out closely related code as classes.
commitResults.messageBody: Created the Parser and Ui classes. Renamed State.java to Command.java, Records.java to TaskList.java and DataHandler.java to Storage.java.

commitResults.messageTitle: Organize classes into suitable java packages
commitResults.messageBody:
Packages created:
- collections
	- TaskList.java
- command
	- Command.java
- exceptions
	- SundayException.java
- task
	- Deadline.java
	- Event.java
	- Task.java
	- Todo.java
-utilities
	- Parser.java
	- Storage.java
	- Ui.java

commitResults.messageTitle: Set up gradle to automate some of the build tasks of the project
commitResults.messageBody: Set up gradle to build and run Sunday. Gradle has also been set up to run checkstyleMain with the checkstyle.xml file.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add JUnit Tests for all Task types.
commitResults.messageBody:
JUnit Tests for all Task types test the creation and saving of each task type.

Detected a bug when saving Deadline and Event tasks where the saved date and time was incorrect. The bug was fixed by changing the DataFomat from "dd/mm/yyyy hhmm" to "dd/MM/yyyy HHmm".

commitResults.messageTitle: Fix relative path for save file
commitResults.messageBody: Fixed bug where save file was unable to be retrieved due to inaccurate relative file path. Text-Ui-Test files have also been updated.

commitResults.messageTitle: Fix relative path for save file
commitResults.messageBody: Added a getFilepath method in Storage to accurately retrieve the save file directory.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add JavaDoc comments and tweak the code to comply with a coding standard
Revert "Add JavaDoc comments and tweak the code to comply with a coding standard"
